package.name: hightorque_rl_inference
package.description:
HighTorque RL Inference Package 高擎机电强化学习推理功能包
A ROS1 package for deploying reinforcement learning policies on humanoid robots using RKNN (Rockchip Neural Network) inference engine. Provides real-time control at 100Hz with comprehensive observation processing and action generation.
用于在人形机器人上部署强化学习策略的 ROS1 功能包， 使用 RKNN（Rockchip Neural Network）推理引擎。 提供 100Hz 实时控制，具有完整的观测处理和动作生成。
Developed by 高擎机电 (HighTorque Robotics)
package.author: 高擎机电研发团队 (HighTorque Robotics Development Team)
